ModMetaData.name: Papou Race : emotional birds
ModMetaData.author: YAYO
ModMetaData.description:
Papou, who have lived in the humid jungle for a long time, have evolved like parrots.

They can fly to survive from the vicious creatures of the jungle, and then when the threat disappears
They try to seduce the opposite sex to leave their genes. and began to devote myself to the method.

Some individuals succeeded in seducing the opposite sex with beautiful colored feathers and others with song and art.
They gradually evolved to be splendid and emotional.
